name: WP AVCL Automation Helper (formerly WPFlyLeads)
author: Ankur Vishwakarma & Ankit Vishwakarma

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

Guide –

  1. Extract the zip file.
  2. Upload woozap directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory .
  3. Activate the plugin by the ‘Plugins’ menu from wp-admin area.
  4. Find a new option under WooCommerce > Wp Fly Leads settings to select options. For Contact Form 7 and Gravity Forms, each form has a new Tab “WP Fly Leads Settings” to select options.
  5. Please check screenshots for more guidance.
sections.faq:
What is Zapier?

Please visit this url https://zapier.com

What is Integromat?

Please visit this url https://www.integromat.com
sections.changelog:
1.0

Initial Version released

2.0

  • Bug Fixing & Functionality Improvements.
  • Added trigger button with Woozap URL field to easily configure the path between WooCommerce and Zapier.

2.1

  • Bug Fixing & Functionality Improvements.
  • A new option WP AVCL Automation Helper Zapier Url Count allows more than one connection under WooCommerce > Settings > General Tab > Woozap Zapier Url {number}.
  • In order table added a new column called “Woozap Trigger Summary” that will help admin to see if API triggered or not.
  • Supports custom products and checkout fields to send to Zapier.

2.2

  • Bug fixing and functionality improvements.
  • Triggers Zapier URL when order status changes to any.
  • Included coupons in order info sending to Zapier.
  • Check if Zapier triggers or not in order notes in each order editor in wp-admin.

2.3

  • Bug fixing and functionality improvements.
  • Separate WP AVCL Automation Helper settings page with brand new options and many new features.
  • Let admin choose when the connection should be triggered on a specific date or specific status change (For WooCommerce Orders).
  • Manual option in each WooCommerce order edit page to send the order to Zapier.

2.4

  • Bug fixing fatal error: undefined function is_wooCommerce_active().

2.5

  • Bug fixing: Not working when switching from v2.2 to v2.3 or 2.4

3.0

  • Bug and Security Fixes
  • New and Better UI
  • Supports new server Integromat along with Zapier to send WooCommerce Orders via webhook.
  • Supports Contact Form 7 with a new Tab, “Wp Fly Leads Settings,” in each form to set up a connection and send leads to Zapier and Integormat.
  • Moved WP AVCL Automation Helper settings underneath WooCommerce > WP Fly Leads Settings. Also, I applied fixes and corrections to the functionality of this page.

3.1

  • Bug Fixes
  • Security Updates
  • UI Improvements

3.2

  • Supports Gravity Forms Submissions Automation
  • Bug Fixes
  • Security Updates
  • UI Improvements

3.3

  • Bug Fixes
  • Security Updates
sections.description:
WP AVCL Automation Helper supports Zapier, Make (formerly Integromat) and Pabbly to send –

  1. Orders from WooCommerce
  2. Submissions from the Contact Form 7
  3. Entries from the Gravity Forms

To thousands of other platforms.==

Notice

Note: Please visit the settings page to update settings after you have switched from 2.2 to 2.5 or a later version.

Note: To use the Zapier webhook, you must have a Zapier premium membership.

  1. Supports new server Integromat along with Zapier to send WooCommerce Orders via webhook.
  2. Supports Contact Form 7 with a new Tab, “WP AVCL Automation Helper Settings,” in each form to set up a connection and send leads to Zapier and Integromat.
  3. Moved WP AVCL Automation Helper settings underneath WooCommerce as submenu. Also, We applied fixes and corrections to the functionality of this page.

Thank You

Thank You for using this plugin, and We appreciate support tickets for improvements. Please let us know the modifications you need in this plugin and the more features and bugs you face. Please let us know if anyone is interested in applying for a contribution.

Screen Cast

Available Soon…
sections.reviews:
Great but with conflicts with other plugins

By pedrovianapav on May 19, 2020

Great but select2.js conflicts with other plugins

Not working anymore

By brianstorm on May 16, 2020

Hey, please update the plugin, it's not working anymore. Cannot access the settings "Sorry, you don't have the rights to access this page" and the zaps are not triggered I will update this review when it's working again

Wonderful

By imaniranica on December 28, 2019

It works, Tnx a lot!

thnks for you

By fathyweb2 on November 12, 2019

thnks for you

Works! Adds new orders to a spreadsheet row

By BG2021 (enikolov) on January 24, 2020

Works! Adds new orders to a spreadsheet row. Just do as in the video. I have the newest WooCommerce and I write this on 12.08.2019 ;) Thanks a lot! P.s. 24.01.2020 - unfortunately Webhooks in zapier was maden only for Premium users :(( So now its the same as using the WooCommerce app in Zapier.

Very nice

By lawlex on July 26, 2019

Respect

Works very well!

By arebold on May 5, 2019

You need to first send Zapier the data by ordering once you have it installed. I'll be making a video on my channel soon. Look for Uriel Soto on youtube.

No Support for New Line Item Order in Zapier

By EM (escapemaker) on April 16, 2019

I was pasting in webhooks under Woocommerce general settings and was able to get everything working on “New Order” trigger but not on “New Line Item” order. It wouldn’t pull in a data set on Zapier. WordPress and Woocommerce alerted me that I didn’t have the official Zapier plug in installed (even though it was from their directory and I didn’t even know there was a paid version). So in desperation to get some help I just purchased the paid version which adds “Zapier Feeds” to the menu in the dashboard and allows you to put webhooks in there instead of general settings in Woocommerce on the dashboard. Once I used that PAID plugin the “New Line Item” trigger was able to pull a data order sample in on Zapier. PLEASE PLEASE alert Zapier and Woocommerce reps that using this with their general Woocommerce settings do not support webhooks entirely **** I just wasted 72 hours of my life with rigorous testing and marathon support chat sessions to bring you this knowledge!! ****

Very nice plugin!

By commenmoov (zionpage) on April 10, 2019

Best alternative to the chargeable Zapier Extension for Woocommerce.

Plugin Didn't Work - Could be Illegal Copy

By steveecon on February 5, 2019

It appears that this plugin has been taken from WooCommerce and modified by Ankur. All Files in the zipped folder including The "Read Me" File in this plugin is identical to the one I purchased for $49 from WooCommerce. But Ankur did change some of the menu functions that appear in wordpress. HOWEVER, THE PLUGIN DID NOT WORK FOR ME AT ALL. The readme file attributes Contributors as: jamescollins, OM4 but NOT Ankur Vishwakarma. Functionality did not work. Couldn't link to Zapier. He did create a different interface for inserting Zap URLs which always produced an error message. When I paid for the official plugin everything worked perfectly the first time. It appears that Ankur has taken WooCommerce work and renamed it as his own. I did notify WooCommerce of this fact. Spend the money and save yourself the frustration of working on this modified version of a plugin.
